about_the_game:
Stoneshard: Prologue is a demo to Stoneshard, an open-world roguelike RPG currently in development.

Key features:


  • Familiarize yourself with the basic mechanics of the main game.
  • Learn the backstory of one of Stoneshard's main characters, Verren.
  • Explore the dark catacombs of the abandoned abbey.
  • Try out a variety of skill trees, from two-handed sword and bows to pyromancy and geomancy.
  • Survive the onslaught of the bloodthirsty cult.
  • Face the mysterious cult leader. Will you be able to defeat him?

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Fantasy Violence, Cartoon Gore, Depiction of Alcohol & Drug Usage, Disturbing Scenes.

detailed_description:
Stoneshard: Prologue is a demo to Stoneshard, an open-world roguelike RPG currently in development.

Key features:


  • Familiarize yourself with the basic mechanics of the main game.
  • Learn the backstory of one of Stoneshard's main characters, Verren.
  • Explore the dark catacombs of the abandoned abbey.
  • Try out a variety of skill trees, from two-handed sword and bows to pyromancy and geomancy.
  • Survive the onslaught of the bloodthirsty cult.
  • Face the mysterious cult leader. Will you be able to defeat him?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 512 Mb or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 or equivalent
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 512 Mb or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: You come to your senses in a sinister dungeon. The Ritual is about to commence – you have only one chance to escape. Stoneshard: Prologue is a demo to the main game, presenting its basic mechanics.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, German, Simplified Chinese, Polish
*languages with full audio support
